content.description: Start about 40 feet left and around the corner from Swaddling at the NW end of the Turtle Egg. Climb a short chimney in a left facing corner then follow a hand crack to the top (crux).
content.protection: Bring gear to a #3 Camalot. Simul-rappel to get off the summit ridge.
content.location: Start about 40 feet left and around the corner from Swaddling at the NW end of the Turtle Egg.

content.description: Start near the SW end of the Turtle Egg, across the canyon from Birds Flock and right (W) of the descent from A Fine Nine. Start in a large left facing corner formed by a chimney. This is near a huge boulder in the center of the canyon. Climb a vertical crack system just left of the chimney in the corner to lower angled terrain. Go up and left along an easier ramp then up right to the summit.
content.location: Start near the SW end of the Turtle Egg, across the canyon from Birds Flock and right (W) of the descent from A Fine Nine. Start in a large left facing corner formed by a chimney. This is near a huge boulder in the center of the canyon.

climbs.name: The Gropinator
climbs.fa: Todd Swain, Tad Welch, Bill Widrig   03-2004

content.description: Climb the obvious left leaning wide crack that starts six feet left of I Will Investigate Myself.
content.protection: Bring gear to at least a #4 Camalot.
content.location: Start six feet left of I Will Investigate Myself.
